Saturday September 18st from 8am-10am Download Volunteer Form Home • Thank You! Buy Tickets Thank You! Loading your ticket, please wait. Do not close this window. Download Your Tickets Download Your Tickets Thanks for purchasing your tickets online. Your tickets are shown here. You can also download them pressing the button. They have also been sent to your email. Check the spam folder just in case. Don’t forget to present them at entry. Our Staff is looking forward to your visit! Sincerely, Your Friends at Sandoway. Volunteer Help Sandoway Discovery Center fulfill our mission of being South Florida’s premier marine life center through education and conservation! Volunteer Schedule a Party Choose from the following programs: Stingray touch tank Skunk encounter Maggie Encounter Gigi Encounter Reserve a Party Adoptions The Sandoway Discovery Center animal adoption program is a great way to help care and feed one animal of your choice for one year. When you sponsor an animal your gift goes directly to support the professional care of your adopted animal. Who Can I Adopt? COMMUNITY PARTNERS 142 South Ocean Blvd. Delray Beach, FL 33483 + 561.274.7263 contact@sandoway.org how to help Become a Member Shark Society Sponsorships Animal Adoptions Volunteer Information Menu Become a Member Shark Society Sponsorships Animal Adoptions Volunteer Information About us What We Offer History Architectural Staff Directory Board Directory Menu What We Offer History Architectural Staff Directory Board Directory Your Visit Event Calendar Hands on Exhibits Special Exhibits Menu Event Calendar Hands on Exhibits Special Exhibits Programs Field Trips Outreach Programs Teacher Resources Menu Field Trips Outreach Programs Teacher Resources Sharks Shark Facts Shark Conservation Shark Education Shark Links Menu Shark Facts Shark Conservation Shark Education Shark Links Book an event Reserve Your Activity Birthday Party Menu Reserve Your Activity Birthday Party Join our mailing list To get Important News, Amazing Offers & Inside Scoops: Name Email Subscribe © 2024 All Rights Reserved Sandoway Discovery Center. / Designed and Developed by Facebook Twitter Instagram VOLUNTEER I am Interested Position: Select Gift Shop Attendant Handyman Butterfly Gardener Animal Care Docent Aquarist First Name Last Name Phone Number: Email Address: Subject: Message: Rental Procedure: A group representative must complete and submit a Facility Rental Reservation Form at least 15 days prior to the event. Rentals will be approved on a first come-first served basis, depending on availability. Facility staff will review the request, and if the requested space is available, a site meeting will be held between the facility manager and the group representative no later than 5 days after the booking. At the time of the site meeting, a $100 non-refundable deposit is due. Payment can be made by check, credit card or cash.  The Facility Rental Policies and Procedures will be reviewed and the Facility User Agreement/Permit will be signed by both parties and issued to the group representative. The day of the event after the clean-up is completed, a walk-through with a facility staff member and the representative will be conducted to ensure the facility is left in the condition it was found. The permitee will be required to pay additional fees for any damage or additional cleaning, or if the rental room is not vacated by the end of the permitted rental time. Cost / payment A $50 non-refundable deposit is due the day of the site meeting. Payment must be in the form of cash, check or credit card. Checks must be payable to: Sandoway Discovery Center. The cost of the room is $50 per hour. WE have no minimum requirement but our maximum capacity is 30 people. Parking Parking is located off of Ingraham Ave. on the south-side of the Center. Please make sure to get a parking pass from the attendant inside the Center to leave on the dashboard of your car. Free parking is provided for a limited number of cars. We only have 10 spaces in our parking lot. Carpooling is highly recommended. Additional policies It is the group’s responsibility to set-up before and clean-up after the facility rental, during the permitted rental time. Due to limited space, groups will not be allowed to store items for the event at the facility prior to or after the event. Food/Drink is allowed ONLY in the permitted room. Groups may not nail, staple, or alter any walls, doors or any area of the facility. Please report any damaged equipment prior to start of birthday party. The facility only provides the permitted space, (8) 6”x2.5” tables and (30) chairs. All other items, such as food, decorations, and supplies, must be provided by the user. Sorry, the facility does not have a kitchenette or items such as tape, utensils, copy machine, cooler, etc. available for use. Cancellation policy Cancellation of a facility rental more than 10 days in advance shall be refunded the $50 deposit in full (please allow 3 weeks for reimbursement). Cancellation of a facility rental less than 10 days in advance will not be given a refund, but will be allowed to reschedule within 90 days. Directions from the north: I-95 to Atlantic Ave. East on Atlantic to A1A (S. Ocean Blvd.) South (right) on A1A, 2 blocks past Sandoway Park sign. Then right onto Ingraham Ave and turn right into lot. Direction from the south: I-95 to Linton Blvd. East on Linton to A1A (S. Ocean Blvd.) North (left) on A1A to Ingraham Ave. Make a left onto Ingraham Ave. and immediately turn right into our lot. Building rules Children must be accompanied by an adult at all times. No running No yelling or disruptive behavior No gum anywhere in the building No climbing or standing on the exhibits or railings No tapping on animal enclosure or tanks Shirt and shoes required Sandoway Discovery Center
Birthday Party Rental Policies and Procedures Birthday Party Procedure: A group representative must complete and submit a Birthday Party Reservation Form at least 15 days prior to the event. Birthday parties will be approved on a first come-first served basis, depending on availability. Facility staff will review the request, and if the requested space is available, a site meeting will be held between the facility manager and the group representative no later than 5 days after the booking. At the time of the site meeting, a $100 non-refundable deposit is due. Payment can be made by check, credit card or cash.  The Birthday Party Rental Policies and Procedures will be reviewed and the Facility User Agreement/Permit will be signed by both parties and issued to the group representative. The day of the event after the clean-up is completed, a walk-through with a facility staff member and the representative will be conducted to ensure the facility is left in the condition it was found. The permitee will be required to pay additional fees for any damage or additional cleaning, or if the rental room is not vacated by the end of the permitted rental time. Cost / payment A $100 non-refundable deposit is due the day of the site meeting. Payment must be in the form of cash, check or credit card. Checks must be payable to: Sandoway Discovery Center. Individual fee payment is due on the day of the party and is $10 per person. We require a minimum of 10 individuals in a party group and our maximum is 30 people which includes children and adults! Parking Parking is located off of Ingraham Ave. on the south-side of the Center. Please make sure to get a parking pass from the attendant inside the Center to leave on the dashboard of your car. Free parking is provided for a limited number of cars. We only have 10 spaces in our parking lot. Carpooling is highly recommended. Direction from the south: I-95 to Linton Blvd. East on Linton to A1A (S. Ocean Blvd.) North (left) on A1A to Ingraham Ave. Make a left onto Ingraham Ave. and immediately turn right into our lot. Directions from the north: I-95 to Atlantic Ave. East on Atlantic to A1A (S. Ocean Blvd.) South (right) on A1A, 2 blocks past Sandoway Park sign. Then right onto Ingraham Ave and turn right into lot. Cancellation policy Cancellation of a party more than 10 days in advance shall be refunded the $100 deposit in full (please allow 3 weeks for reimbursement). Cancellation of a party less than 10 days in advance will not be given a refund, but the group will be allowed to reschedule within 90 days. Building rules Children must be accompanied by an adult at all times. No running No yelling or disruptive behavior No gum anywhere in the building No climbing or standing on the exhibits or railings No tapping on animal enclosure or tanks Shirt and shoes required Additional policies It is the group’s responsibility to set-up before and clean-up after the party, during the permitted rental time. Due to limited space, groups will not be allowed to store items for the event at the facility prior to or after the event. Food/Drink is allowed ONLY in the permitted room. Groups may not nail, staple, or alter any walls, doors or any area of the facility. Please report any damaged equipment prior to start of birthday party. The facility only provides the permitted space, (8) 6”x2.5” tables and (30) chairs. All other items, such as food, decorations, and party supplies, must be provided by the user. Sorry, the facility does not have a kitchenette or items such as tape, utensils, copy machine, cooler, etc. available for use. Membership Has Its Perks! Enjoy an Annual Membership to Sandoway Discovery Center! Members receive free admission, in addition to members only discounts. Individual One adult over the age of 18 $25 Grandparent Two adults and all grandchildren under 18 $50 Family Two adults and all children in the household under 18 $50 FREE ADMISSION Enjoy for one full year FREE admission to the nature center for one year plus discounts on special events and birthday party bookings. 15% GIFT SHOP SAVINGS Find special gifts Your new membership package includes a variety of Sandoway swag in addition to a 15% discount in our gift shop all year long. SPECIAL INVITATIONS Be a VIP with Sandoway You'll receive invitations to special programs and member-only events throughout the year. DECK84 DISCOUNTS Delicious waterside dining Save 20% off your check at Deck84 located on the intracoastal in Delray. SURF SHACK - 15% OFF Delicious food and smoothies Take 15% off your entire check at Surf Shack Subs, Smoothies and Bowls throughout the year. DELIVERY DUDES Get instant food to your door Take $5 off on every order
through Delray Delivery Dudes with your Membership Card. pizza $5 OFF ANTHONY'S COAL FIRED PIZZA, DELRAY Grab a slice $5 off your check at the Delray Beach location. 10% OFF POPCORN Tasty treats for less Take 10% off your entire purchase at the Original Popcorn House of Delray Beach. $2 OFF SILVERBALL Enjoy arcade savings Receive $2 off your entry to the Silverball Pinball Museum in downtown Delray Beach. DELRAY BEACH TOURS Experience the history Save $2.00 off every ticket purchased for the Delray Beach Historical Tour.

Sandoway Discovery Center, a 501 © 3 non-profit organization, relies on grants and donations to support programming, staff, exhibits, animal care and the maintenance of our historic home and the surrounding gardens. Rentals will be approved on a first come-first served basis, depending on availability. Facility staff will review the request, and if the requested space is available, a site meeting will be held between the facility manager and the group representative no later than 5 days after the booking. At the time of the site meeting, a $100 non-refundable deposit is due. Payment can be made by check, credit card or cash.  The Facility Rental Policies and Procedures will be reviewed and the Facility User Agreement/Permit will be signed by both parties and issued to the group representative. The day of the event after the clean-up is completed, a walk-through with a facility staff member and the representative will be conducted to ensure the facility is left in the condition it was found. The permitee will be required to pay additional fees for any damage or additional cleaning, or if the rental room is not vacated by the end of the permitted rental time. Cost / payment A $50 non-refundable deposit is due the day of the site meeting. Payment must be in the form of cash, check or credit card. Checks must be payable to: Sandoway Discovery Center. The cost of the room is $50 per hour. WE have no minimum requirement but our maximum capacity is 30 people. Parking Parking is located off of Ingraham Ave. on the south-side of the Center. Please make sure to get a parking pass from the attendant inside the Center to leave on the dashboard of your car. Free parking is provided for a limited number of cars. We only have 10 spaces in our parking lot. Carpooling is highly recommended. Additional policies It is the group’s responsibility to set-up before and clean-up after the facility rental, during the permitted rental time. Due to limited space, groups will not be allowed to store items for the event at the facility prior to or after the event. Food/Drink is allowed ONLY in the permitted room. Groups may not nail, staple, or alter any walls, doors or any area of the facility. Please report any damaged equipment prior to start of birthday party. The facility only provides the permitted space, (8) 6”x2.5” tables and (30) chairs. All other items, such as food, decorations, and supplies, must be provided by the user. Sorry, the facility does not have a kitchenette or items such as tape, utensils, copy machine, cooler, etc. available for use. Cancellation policy Cancellation of a facility rental more than 10 days in advance shall be refunded the $50 deposit in full (please allow 3 weeks for reimbursement). Cancellation of a facility rental less than 10 days in advance will not be given a refund, but will be allowed to reschedule within 90 days. Direction from the south: I-95 to Linton Blvd. East on Linton to A1A (S. Ocean Blvd.) North (left) on A1A to Ingraham Ave. Make a left onto Ingraham Ave. and immediately turn right into our lot. No running No yelling or disruptive behavior No gum anywhere in the building No climbing or standing on the exhibits or railings No tapping on animal enclosure or tanks Shirt and shoes required Sandoway Discovery Center

Ocean Blvd., Delray Beach, FL 33483 561.274.7263 Email Visit Website Beachside Arts & Culture Description The animals are practically jumping for joy at the thought of seeing you all!   You'll have access to our coral tanks and reptile room, our Children's Room, the touch tank, our new and improved shell room, animal encounters and our outside butterfly garden, plus so much more. We are currently renovating our backyard to give our guests and our animals a larger and updated space to live and play!  The center is open during construction but please note that shark feedings may be canceled.  Please visit our website for the most current schedule at www.sandoway.org . If you have any questions before you visit, please give us a call at 561.274.7263 or send us an e-mail at contact@sandoway.org . _______________________ Sandoway Discovery Center is located in a historic 1936 beachfront home in Delray Beach, Florida.  The house is on the National Register of Historic Places and preserved as a unique Nature Center now home to native plants, live animals, and a world class shell collection. The Center offers a glimpse into South Florida’s fragile marine and freshwater environments through educational exhibits and programs. Admission is $10 per-person, ages 3 and up. We offer discounted admission to South Florida Science Center and Aquarium members. Contact Info 142 S. Saturday September 18st from 8am-10am Download Volunteer Form Home • About Sandoway Discovery Center DELRAYS BEACHSIDE NATURE CENTER Mission Statement: As one of South Florida's premier coastal ecosystems and marine life centers, we will transform and inspire our visitors through experiential education and conservation. Sandoway Discovery Center, offers a glimpse into South Florida’s fragile marine and freshwater environments through educational exhibits and programs. The nature center opened its doors in 1998 and quickly captivated the interest of students, teachers, naturalists, community leaders, visitors and residents of Delray Beach and surrounding communities. The unique facility is an exciting hands-on learning experience, which focuses on Florida’s fragile ecosystems and their inhabitants. Visitors of all ages can get an up-close view of some of Florida’s native and invasive reptile species, meet sharks and other fish at the center’s 15,000- gallon reef pool, explore Southeast Florida’s largest shell collection and join us for special events such as Earth Day and beach clean-ups. The center’s children’s activity room is a great spot to read stories, learn about the life cycle of a butterfly and look at interesting things under the microscope. The observation deck, butterfly garden, and dune exhibit also allow visitors to learn about our unique coastal environment. Sandoway Discovery Center is an historic home where one can experience Delray’s rich natural history through a self-guided tour. The open-air porch, Dade County pine floors, Bald Cypress ceilings, French doors and arched window on the staircase, are just some of the architectural details that evoke impressions of early beach-front living. The nature center’s activities include daily shark and stingray feedings, aquarium feedings, animal encounters, field trip and outreach programs, beach clean-ups, butterfly garden, live animal exhibits, and more. The Friends of Sandoway House Nature Center, Inc. is a non-profit organization dedicated to educating the public about Delray’s coastal and marine ecosystems as well as Florida’s natural history all to benefit future generations. Want to make a strong impact? Volunteering is a great way to gain experience in a future field of study, or to meet people and make new friends. We have a variety of positions available and we will do our best to ensure your volunteering experience is as beneficial for you as it is for us. General requirements for volunteering: Must be at least fifteen years old. No court ordered service hours. Complete the application process. Commit to working at least three hours per week for a minimum of six months. Fees: -Adults, 18 years of age and older: $24 for a background check. We need your help!

Available Positions Gift Shop Attendant Welcome the public, collect payment for admission and gift store purchases, answer questions in person and over the phone, interact with visitors, and assist with membership and adoption. Weekly shifts available. I am Interested Handyman​ Help with general maintenance around the nature center such as: general repairs, painting, etc. Hours flexible. I am Interested Butterfly Gardener Assist with maintaining the butterfly garden and Native plant gardens by weeding, pruning, watering and/or planting. Hours flexible. I am Interested Animal Care Care for our educational animals by cleaning cages, changing water, and feeding. Weekly shifts available. I am Interested Docent Assist staff with teaching school programs and interact with visitors through touch tank, biofact and/ or animal roving and animal exhibit talks. Weekly shifts available. Weekly shifts available. Saturday September 18st from 8am-10am Download Volunteer Form Home • About • What We Offer WHAT WE OFFER Sandoway Discovery Center is one of south Florida’s premier coastal ecosystems and marine life centers - inspiring our visitors through experiential education and conservation. A Hidden Gem on A1A in charming        
                  Delray Beach! Sandoway Discovery Center offers a glimpse into south Florida’s fragile marine and freshwater environments through educational exhibits and programs. Sandoway opened its doors in 1998 and quickly captivated the interest of students, teachers, naturalists, community leaders, visitors and residents of Delray Beach and surrounding communities. The unique facility offers hands-on learning experiences, which focus on Florida’s fragile ecosystems and their inhabitants. Visitors of all ages can get an up-close view of some of Florida’s native and invasive species of animals! Meet sharks and other fish at the coral reef pool, explore southeast Florida’s largest private shell collection and join us for special events such as Earth Day and beach clean-ups. The observation deck, shell collection and butterfly garden also allow visitors to learn about our unique coastal environment. You can also touch stingrays in our stingray touch tank as well as learn about nocturnal animals, reptiles, birds and amphibians. The nature center’s activities include daily shark and stingray feedings, aquarium feedings, and animal encounters! Sandoway’s environmental field trips and outreach programs, teach students and visitors about the importance of coastal conservation using live animal encounters, artifacts, and interactive educational equipment. Our programs provide STEM based environmental education classes with a focus on students at-risk of educational failure. Want to make a strong impact?  Explore our: Corporate Memberships Volunteer Help Sandoway Discovery Center fulfill our mission of being South Florida’s premier marine life center through education and conservation! When you sponsor an animal your gift goes directly to support the professional care of your adopted animal. Who Can I Adopt? Complaints Complaints about Discovery Bank products or services We've made a commitment to provide great service to all our clients. This means we investigate any complaints our clients send us and aim to resolve them fairly and as soon as possible. What happens when you send us a complaint? We'll acknowledge receipt of your complaint by email within 24 hours. An independent team will investigate your complaint, and it will be subject to a senior executive review. We'll update you on the status of your complaint during the process and give you the outcome in writing. How to send a complaint If you have a complaint, you can call us on 0800 07 96 97 or email complaints@discovery.bank What happens if you aren't happy with the outcome of a complaint? You can contact the National Financial Ombud Scheme If you aren't happy with the outcome of a complaint after it has been through our internal review process, you can send the complaint to the National Financial Ombud Scheme. The National Financial Ombud Scheme has the final say on complaints in the banking industry and credit-related matters. To get in touch with the National Financial Ombud Scheme, you can call 0860 800 900 or email info@nfosa.co.za , or visit nfosa.co.za You can contact the FAIS Ombudsman The FAIS Ombudsman is an independent and impartial dispute resolution tribunal that investigates complaints by clients about financial services that financial services providers, like Discovery Bank, offer. To get in touch with the FAIS Ombudsman, you can call 012 762 5000 or 012 470 9080, or visit www.faisombud.co.za You can contact the National Credit Regulator The National Credit Regulator resolves complaints about credit-related matters. To get in touch with the National Credit Regulator, you can call 011 554 2700 or 0860 627 627, or visit www.ncr.org.za You can contact the Consumer Goods and Services Ombud The Consumer Goods and Services Ombud enforces the Code of Conduct that applies to the consumer goods and services industry by dealing with consumer goods complaints that they receive from consumers free of charge. Discovery Invest aims to resolve all complaints within 21 working days of receipt if all the relevant information has been received. If we are unable to provide feedback in this time, we will inform you. What to do to resolve your complaint: Speak to your Financial Adviser: If you have any concern about your Discovery Invest policy and / or the financial advice you have been provided with, first discuss it with your adviser. If you are still not satisfied submit the complaint to the adviser in writing, if you have not yet. Remember to have all relevant documentation supporting your concerns available to assist the adviser to resolve your concerns. If you are not satisfied with the response or should the adviser not respond within 6 weeks , you may contact the FAIS Ombudsman. Contact Discovery Invest Complaints Department: You can submit your complaint in writing together with any supporting documentation to invest_complaints@discovery.co.za if you are not satisfied with the response you have received from your adviser. You can also follow this process if you prefer to raise a complaint directly with us. The requirements are: Your complaint must be in writing Your Discovery Invest policy number related to the complaint should be included You should provide us with specific information, correspondence and documentation relevant to your complaint Contact the relevant Ombudsman Should your complaint not be resolved to your satisfaction or if we have failed to respond to your complaint within 6 weeks, then you may submit your complaint to the FAIS Ombudsman or the Ombudsman for Long Term Insurance. You may pursue the complaint with the Ombudsman within 6 months from the date that Discovery Invest responded to your complaint in writing. The FAIS Ombudsman: The FAIS Ombudsman is an independent and impartial dispute resolution tribunal which investigates, considers and disposes of complaints by consumers regarding financial services rendered by Financial Services Providers (such as Discovery Invest). The Ombudsman provides a fair, unbiased, reasonable, economical and expeditious relief to the ordinary person at no charge. Rentals will be approved on a first come-first served basis, depending on availability. Facility staff will review the request, and if the requested space is available, a site meeting will be held between the facility manager and the group representative no later than 5 days after the booking. At the time of the site meeting, a $100 non-refundable deposit is due. Payment can be made by check, credit card or cash.  The Facility Rental Policies and Procedures will be reviewed and the Facility User Agreement/Permit will be signed by both parties and issued to the group representative. The day of the event after the clean-up is completed, a walk-through with a facility staff member and the representative will be conducted to ensure the facility is left in the condition it was found. The permitee will be required to pay additional fees for any damage or additional cleaning, or if the rental room is not vacated by the end of the permitted rental time. Cost / payment A $50 non-refundable deposit is due the day of the site meeting. Payment must be in the form of cash, check or credit card. Checks must be payable to: Sandoway Discovery Center. The cost of the room is $50 per hour. WE have no minimum requirement but our maximum capacity is 30 people. Parking Parking is located off of Ingraham Ave. on the south-side of the Center. Please make sure to get a parking pass from the attendant inside the Center to leave on the dashboard of your car. Free parking is provided for a limited number of cars. We only have 10 spaces in our parking lot. Carpooling is highly recommended. Additional policies It is the group’s responsibility to set-up before and clean-up after the facility rental, during the permitted rental time. Saturday September 18st from 8am-10am Download Volunteer Form Home • About • History History Sandoway was built for retired produce broker J.B. Evans from Deerfield Beach in 1936.  It is believed that Mr. Evans commissioned local architect Samuel Ogren to design the house as a retirement home.  Mr. Evans was appointed as Lieutenant-Colonel and Personal Aide to Florida Governor Fred P. Cone in 1937.  The position was honorary and consisted of accompanying the Governor on state and ceremonial occasions.  Sandoway is listed in the master site file Inventory of Historic Structures by the Florida Department of State and is also listed in the City of Delray Beach’s Local Register of Historic Places as well as National Register of Historic Places. All of the restoration work done by the Friends of Sandoway House in 1997-98 met the standards prescribed for the rehabilitation of an historic structure as called for by the United States Secretary of the Interior. Sandoway provides cultural significance as it exemplifies the historical, political, economic, and social trends reflected in Delray Beach during the Great Depression .  Designed in a unique style adapted to both the local climate and socio-economic conditions of the nation, the house provides significant clues about the values, lifestyle and social consciousness of the upper-class citizens moving to Delray Beach during the 1930s. In 1995, The Friends of Sandoway House Nature Center, Inc. was formed with the express purpose of restoring the beachfront property for use as a nature museum highlighting marine and coastal life and natural local vegetation. The County of Palm Beach owns the property and leases it to the City of Delray Beach, who, in turn, sublets it to the Friends of Sandoway House. The building and property were opened to the public in May 1998. They started conducting programs for school children during the summer, as well as guiding many families of children and adults through the exhibits and other nature programs offered by the museum. ** Reference ** Sandoway Designation Report, City of Delray Beach Historic Preservation Board, 1996 Want to make a strong impact?
